charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute and to Distribute Methamphetamine, a Schedule III Controlled Substance, in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) (1)
21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE METHAMPHETAMINE, A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, in violation of 21:USC 841(b)(1)(A)(viii) (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment 115 months. This sentence shall run concurrently w/state sentence imposed on 7/30/99 in California, case SCD-139754 that deft is presently serving. Court recommends deft participate in intensive drug education and treatment program. Further recommends deft be placed at FCI Terminal Island, California to enable deft to be in close proximity to his family. Deft remanded to custody of US Marshal. Supervised Release 5 years. Deft not to possess firearm. Deft to participate in program for treatment of narcotic addiction or drug or alcohol dependency to include testing. Deft to abstain from use of alcoholic beverages and/or all other intoxicants during and after course of treatment. Deft to pay for cost of treatment to extent able. Deft not to possess or have under his control any dangerous weapons. Penalty Assessment $100 due immediately. Fine waived due to inability to pay. (1s)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) Distribution of Methamphetamine, a Schedule III Controlled Substance (2-3)
21:841(a)(1) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MIXTURE OR SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF METHAMPHETAMINE, A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE (2s-3s)
